DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine whether a glaucoma therapy is safe and effective in treating patients with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Glaucoma Therapy to Treat Open-Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Adult patients of either sex of any race diagnosed with openangle glaucoma (with or without pseudoexfoliation or pigment dispersion component) or ocular hypertension. Other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply. Under age 18. Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply.
